"Damage Tally Practice: Rockbear":
"In this quest, you can measure the damage that you're currently able to do to an enemy.

You cannot obtain EXP, Meseta or items here.

Some PAs and Techniques, such as Zanverse, will not have their damage counted."

"You can select which mode you want to play by talking to Astarte.

■20 Second Tally
・Measures the damage you deal in 20 seconds 5 times.

■Free Mode
・Lets you fight as long as you like without totalling your damage. As there is no time limit, you will need to return to the Campship to end the quest."
